projects.title: NWKRTC Bus Tracking
description: A client-server based architecture for tracking NWKRTC Busses
Backend developed using Java, Spring, MySQL and Redis
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions
One click deployment and scaling using docker-compose
Implemented latest security techniqies such as OAuth2.0
